document_data.name: Cinnabar
document_data.type: Substance, ore{{Cite dragon/13/How Heavy Is My Giant|7}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Cinnabar''' was an ore of [[quicksilver]] that was used decoratively, in magic [[spell]]s and rituals, and in [[poison]]making.
document_data.Properties: Cinnabar was a soft, red stone, with a weight of {{SI|506|pound|k|long=yes}} per {{SI|1|cubic foot|l|long=yes}}, making it one of the heaviest minerals.{{Cite dragon/152/In a Cavern, In a Canyon...|23}}
document_data.Availability: * Cinnabar could be found in the form of a rich red sand, often near hot springs and volcanoes.

Usages.Spell Components:
* As a [[spell component]], cinnabar was used in castings of ''[[animate water]]'',{{Cite dragon/130/Arcane Lore: Magic from East to West|18}} ''[[animate wood]]'', and ''[[surelife]]''.
* In the land of the [[Red Wizards]], [[Thay]], cinnabar was used in overly complex [[arcane]] spells for the small quantities of quicksilver in the mineral. When used together with [[mustard oil]], it was converted to quicksilver, which allowed for additional reflective and translocative ''[[dweomer]]s''.
